title: Committing the crimes
author: VD
content_html:
That Brits won’t commit:

More than one crime in five in London is now committed by a foreign national, raising fresh fears over the impact of immigration. Around a third of all sex offences and a half of all frauds in the capital are carried out by non-British citizens.

I’d really like to know why supporters of immigration believe that the invaded culture will change the behavior of the invaders rather than the invaders changing the invaded culture. Both historical and current evidence suggest that the latter probability is the higher one.

Perhaps the BNP should adopt a new slogan. Cut crime 20 percent! It’s clear that mass deportations are coming, it’s just a question of sooner rather than later, because the status quo is inherently unstable.
